'''''Operation Thunderous Ignition''''' is a [[Daily Commission]] that occurs in [[Inazuma]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|A band of rogues has appeared out in the wild, threatening the safety of the surrounding area. Head over there and take them out. Who knows &mdash; you might make wondrous use out of the nearby [[Thunder Sakura Boughs]] and [[Thunder Dwelling]]s.}}
# Complete [[Time Trial Challenge]] 0/1
# Opponents defeated: 0/x
#* Charge Thunder Dwelling to cause great amount of {{Color|Electro DMG}}
